keywords.indexterm: CSS Support in oXygen AuthorOxygen CSS extensions

conbody.p: CSS stylesheets provide support mainly for displaying documents. When editing documents some non-standard, CSS extensions are useful, for example:

ul.li: property for marking foldable elements in large files;
enforcing a display mode for the XML tags regardless of the current mode selected by the author user;
construct an URL from a relative path location;
